A

ArtificialDatabase - Class in partsom.util
Utility to generate artificial databases in form of bidimensional vectors of random numbers.
ArtificialDatabase() - Constructor for class partsom.util.ArtificialDatabase
 

C

CentralPartSom - Class in partsom
This is the central version of the partSOM architecture, where codebooks and index vectors are received (in a central processing unit) and the database is remounted.
CentralPartSom(int[], double[][]) - Constructor for class partsom.CentralPartSom
Constructor.

E

executeClustering() - Method in class partsom.CentralPartSom
Applies the prototype-based algorithm, this time to the remounted data.
executeClustering() - Method in class partsom.LocalPartSom
Applies the prototype-based algorithm and get codebook and the most representative classes from the database.

L

LocalPartSom - Class in partsom
This is the local version of the partSOM architecture, where the prototype- based algorithm (in this case K-Means) is applied to the databases.
LocalPartSom(double[][], int) - Constructor for class partsom.LocalPartSom
Constructor.
